desserts.name: Pure Unfiltered Evil
desserts.description: Our mad scientists in the McSonic laboratories have come up with this diabolical creation. It's a mixed bowl filled with M&Ms and Skittles. We don't know (and don't care) how much of either is in the bowl. Just that there's both. Enjoy.

desserts.name: Foie Gras Just Desserts
desserts.description: We force feed you a third of your body weight in grains. Hope you had a light meal.
